name: Gust of Hermes
description: Grants the user's summon +5 speed while the relic is being used. (Infinite duration, and only one relic can be active at a time)

name: Spark of Zeus
description: Grants the user's summon +15 attack while the relic is being used. (Infinite duration, and only one relic can be active at a time)

name: Cup of Dionysus
description: Grants the user's summon +25 MP regen while the relic is being used. (Infinite duration, and only one relic can be active at a time)
